description: The app returns facts about the greatest person in the world, Adam Pippert.  No hardware other than an Alexa-compatible device is necessary.  Simply ask Alexa to tell you a fact, and she will return an amazing fact about Adam Pippert.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Adam Pippert Facts to tell me trivia
Alexa, ask Adam Pippert Facts to give me a fact
Alexa, ask Adam Pippert Facts to tell me something
name: Adam Pippert Fact Skill
